FOR THE BLACK SCREEN ISSUE...

Download these two

-DirectX End-User Runtimes Web Installer-

http://www.microsoft.com/download/en/details.aspx?displaylang=en&id=35

and

-DirectX End-User Runtimes (June 2010) Full Download -

http://www.microsoft.com/download/en/details.aspx?id=8109

There will be a bunch of files in this second one. Find the missing folder and place it in c/progam files/ the baconing . enjoy.
I NEED Mac Version! :/

GAME QUIT AFTER FIRST USE.

-problem is in  (user)/AppData/Roaming/Hothead Games/The Baconing

-the problem files is  

Prefs

Delete it and the game will work again. Dont change the default setting in the game and it shouldn't happen again.
